channel.title: How do you make portals or items that teleport?
channel.description: How to make a portal teleport you somewhere? (508) and How do you make an item make you teleport? Like how to make a ring teleport you somewhere like, glory or ring of dueling (508) thanks 4 helping :)

item.title: How do you make portals or items that teleport?
item.dc:creator: @thel33test thel33test
item.description:
@thel33test wrote:

If(objectId == (object id goes here)) {
toX = (Xaxis coords go here);
toY = (Yaxis coords go here);
}

and there you go, all you need to do is find object id and coords id try ::mypos for coords- Your Welcome.

item.title: How do you make portals or items that teleport?
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

[quote=“wanbliscape, post:5, topic:326477”]So I put this in player.java? and i would put

makeGlobalObject(3167, 2965, 2477, 0, 10); // Portal!
3167=x coordinate
2965=y coordinate
2477=object id
deletethatobject(3167, 2965);
^
client.java

if ((objectID == 2477) && (starter == 0)) {
triggerTele(2973, 3343, 0);
sM(“Information”);
}
^
IDK where it goes

like that? or how is the exact way is it oppose to look when I put it in, Thanks for helping really useful![/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make portals or items that teleport?
item.dc:creator: @wanbliscape wanbliscape
item.description:
@wanbliscape wrote:

So I put this in player.java? and i would put

makeGlobalObject(3167, 2965, 2477, 0, 10); // Portal!
3167=x coordinate
2965=y coordinate
2477=object id

deletethatobject(3167, 2965);
if ((objectID == 2477) && (starter == 0)) {
triggerTele(2973, 3343, 0);
sM(“Information”);
}

like that? or how is the exact way is it oppose to look when I put it in, Thanks for helping really useful!

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make portals or items that teleport?

item.title: How do you make portals or items that teleport?
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

makeGlobalObject(3167, 2965, 2477, 0, 10); // Portal!
3167=x coordinate
2965=y coordinate
2477=object id
rest is not needed
perhaps u need to delete a object first
deletethatobject(3167, 2965);

use the code:

if ((objectID == 2477) && (starter == 0)) {
triggerTele(2973, 3343, 0);
sM(“Information”);
}

Read full topic
